title: Accounting Clerk – Foreign Payables
purpose:
Computes, classifies, records, and verifies numerical data for use in maintaining accounting
records in the Finance & Accounts Department.
relationships: Reports to the Accounting Supervisor – General Books
supervisory: This job has no supervisory responsibilities.
education:  High School education with passes at the GCE ‘A' Levels in Accounts and a minimum of
three (3) other CXC subjects, including Mathematics.
 One to three (1-3) years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of
